name: Dual Doomerangs
description:
A game example made in 2 days for the Gdevelop Example Jam #1.

Yikes! Doomer has to defend himself from the endless hoards of remoodroops! Click to throw your horn boomerang (or doomerange), they get thrown in the direction your click or tap was! You can only throw your second doomerang when the first one is already out and about. Get a high score and have fun!

This examples how to make boomerang projectile, enemies spawning around the player and high score mechanics. Download the .zip to learn how to do these mechanics.

Also has helpful comments in it's source. This game works on mobile too.
